Table of Contents

Name

taxon - orbit classification

Synopsis

taxon

Description

taxon classifies 2D or 3D orbits. An ascii input file with positions is all that is needed. A taxon.par file controls the program.

Parameters

Example 2D input 
43.orb            input ascii table with X,Y positions
2 0 0 1            jdim,jcla,jcl,jpan

jdim : Dimension (2 or 3)

jcla : Dump results to file

jcl : Dump simplified results to file

jpan : Dump messages to the screen

Author

Daniel Carpintero

Files

usr/carpintero

See Also

stoo(1NEMO) , snapmask(1NEMO) , orbit(1NEMO)

Carpintero & Aguilar, 1998. MNRAS 298, 1.

History


oct-2006    V13.1    DC
25-jul-2013    added to NEMO    PJT
